articles.author: Steven Goff
articles.title: Haji Wright delivers as USMNT beats Australia 2-1, but Christian Pulisic injury clouds win - Yahoo Sports
articles.description: Pulisic’s absence did not prevent his teammates from rallying around Wright, who, in his first U.S. start in 13 months, tied the match in the 33rd minute and...
articles.content: COMMERCE CITY, Colo. If the U.S. mens national team is going to make a significant run at the 2026 World Cup, its going to need top attacker Christian Pulisic on the field and in good form. This much… [+6106 chars]
